summary:
Only certain bows (high level/quality) can be crafted at the forge and so this just allows you to create the rest. This mod adds the following bows to the forge (doesn\'t alter tempering): 

Nord Hero Bow (Draugr) - 2 leather, 3 leather strips, firewood, 2 tundra cotton, steel ingot 
Long Bow (Iron) - leather, 3 leather strips, firewood, 2 tundr
descriptionHtml:
Only certain bows (high level/quality) can be crafted at the forge and so this just allows you to create the rest. This mod adds the following bows to the forge (doesn\'t alter tempering): 

Nord Hero Bow (Draugr) - 2 leather, 3 leather strips, firewood, 2 tundra cotton, steel ingot 
Long Bow (Iron) - leather, 3 leather strips, firewood, 2 tundra cotton 
Forsworn Bow (Steel) - 2 tundra cotton, steel ingot, 3 leather strips, 2 leather 
Hunting Bow (Steel) - 2 tundra cotton, firewood, 3 leather strips, 2 leather 
Falmer Bow (Falmer) - 2 tundra cotton, 2 chaurus chitin, 3 leather strips, 2 leather 
Falmer Supple Bow (Falmer) - 2 leather, 3 leather strips, 4 charus chitin, 2 tundra cotton 

All but the Long Bow require Steel smithing perk. 
The tundra cotton is there for the part you pull back on the bow and the firewood for the framework. Let me know if you think the recipes should be altered and if there\'s any other mods you\'d like me to create! 

Oh and the filename in the mod list is actually Craftable Arrows as I named it wrongly!
author: addrum
